channel.title: If not wearing right stuf, nothing hppens
channel.description:
how do i make it so when ur not wearing the appropiate items, it doesn't do anything
example: if your wearing rune arrows with karils crossbow, it wont atk example 2: if you attack while wearing rune crossbow with rune arrows, says "you dont have the right arrows 2 fire"
another step towards my perfect range :)

item.title: If not wearing right stuf, nothing hppens
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

well i was thinking like

if (playerequipment[playerweapon] = K’Bow Id && playerequipment[weapon] = bolt rack id) {
usebow = false;
}

wuld that work? if so, where

the only way i know how to fix it is search for this

boolean UseBow = false;

then instead of use bow rename change to item Id’s
